cast.name: 尼尔苏·贝尔芬·阿克塔斯 Nilsu Berfin Aktas
杜嘉克·伊迪兹 Dogac Yildiz
古奈·卡拉卡卢 Günay Karacaoglu

introduction: In the series, Inci (Nilsu Berfin Aktaş), the apple of her family's eye, is a scholarship student at Ulusözler College. She gets pregnant by Mert (Eren Ören), her classmate, who is also the son of the owner of the school she attends. The lives of the two young people who are preparing for the university exam and running after their dreams change forever. The change in their children's lives will also deeply affect their families.Inci's mother, Seher (Günay Karacaoğlu), works as a janitor at the same school. In the world she has built with Selahattin (Şevket Çoruh), they’ve struggled endlessly for their children. Their biggest dream is for their daughter Inci, who has always made them proud, to become a doctor.Turgut (Murat Aygen) is the owner and director of Ulusözler College. His marriage to Aylin (Didem Balçın), whom he intimidates and scares, is like a project. Although Aylin remains a part of this project, she is ready to make any sacrifice for her children.
